channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 22:50 Air alarm to the Kherson region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 22:50 Air alarm to the Kherson region follow the following messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 22:37 The threat of shelling! The Chervonohrigor Territorial Community is now Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 22:37 The threat of shelling! The Chervonohrigor Territorial Community is now Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 22:36 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Watch for further messages.
